name: SRE (Site Reliability Engineer)
description:
About us:

  • Flexible working hours;
  • Remote work;
  • We are ready to negotiate the salary level;
  • VMI with dentistry;
  • Plenty of professional learning opportunities: English courses, professional trainings.

Current tasks:

  • Design, develop and implement systems that improves the stability, scalability, availability and latency of our betting platform;
  • Solve problems occurring with our highly available production systems and build solutions and automation to prevent them from happening again;
  • Build effective monitoring to monitor the health of your system, and jump in to handle outages;
  • Build and run capacity tests to manage the growth of our systems;
  • Plan for reliability by designing systems to work across our data centers;
  • Develop tools to assist the product development teams with successfully deploying change sets.
  • Be an advocate of engineering best practices;

We will evaluate:

  • Experience with building, operating and maintaining complex and scalable systems;
  • Solid understanding of Software Engineering and Computer Science principles;
  • Experience with Infrastructure as Code technologies such as Ainsible, Puppet or Terraform;
  • Knowledge of cloud computing fundamentals;
  • Solid foundation in Windows and Linux administration and troubleshooting;
  • Understanding of Windows .net wcf and IIS service management;
  • Practice in rabbitmq, redis, splunk and enterprise level monitoring systems;
  • Experience in Azure Infrastructure Administration;
  • Practice in rabbitmq, redis, splunk and enterprise level monitoring systems;
  • Additional experience in Networking, Security is a plus;
  • Experience with virtualization technologies such as KVM, Openstack and alternatives is a plus.
